row-one.title: Trust your deal partner
row-one.paragrapgh: Application for trading between strangers online or offline protects deal of any size for little money

list.paragraph-one: WinWin solves the trust problem between strangers when they trade online or face to face.
list.paragraph-two: As an independent third party WinWin holds the funds in trust, limits the uncertainty of sale and risk of fraud.
list.paragraph-three: The seller and the buyer resolve claims and negotiations directly and fully automated according to the WinWin algorithm.
